description.value:
Special: SM Wep, Flame, Spray, Sanctified

Note: Space Marines Only. Master-Crafted Relic Astartes Flamer of the Fire Angels Chapter. Heretics and other such individuals who have forsaken the light of The Emperor suffer -10 to avoid being hit and +2 damage when hit by this weapon. As with all Astartes Flamers, those on fire take +4 damage from being on fire.
